ygData.subject: Re: Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I understand, in one of the latest patches, the special abilities granted by the different illusion spells were removed unintentionally. Does anyone
ygData.messageBody:
From what I understand, in one of the latest patches, the special abilities
granted by the different illusion spells were removed unintentionally. Does
anyone know if they have put those back in yet?

Also, has anyone else noticed a decrease in your pet's hp as of late?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Proteus Proteus [SMTP:proteus456@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 1:31 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
>
> From: "Proteus Proteus" <proteus456@...>
>
> I have heard that the illusion elemental, illusion:drybone spells greatly
> increase your attack value, and allow you to melee for 30-40pts a hit..is
> this true? (I know the druid spirit wolf spell rocks..we get this one
> too).
> I've also heard that illusion:werewolf (lvl49) gives you regen, and a SoW
> equivalent...
>
>
